title: Smart Eco Duplex with Private Garden in Podgórze
description: Experience contemporary eco-conscious living in this spacious duplex located in Krakow’s sought-after Podgórze district. Featuring 4 light-filled bedrooms and 3 modern bathrooms, this 158 sqm residence offers elegance paired with advanced smart home technology. Enjoy gatherings in open, hardwood-floored living spaces leading directly into your private fenced garden – perfect for sustainability enthusiasts or young families.
neighborhood_description: Podgórze strikes the ideal balance between city convenience and tranquil space. Wander tree-lined bike routes to the nearby parks or attend local markets that reflect a thriving, eco-conscious and family-oriented community. With excellent public transport links, extensive bike lanes, and access to key highways, daily commute and connectivity are never an issue.
target_buyer: Ideal for eco-minded property investors seeking strong rental demand, families wanting modern amenities, or those prioritizing a balance between city access and sustainable living.
market_positioning: This eco-modern duplex presents an exceptional opportunity in Podgórze’s competitive market for investors and families alike, blending immediate contemporary comfort with future-focused community living.
